nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels 3D Activity Book is a children's publication from Egmont. It was released on October 9, 2014.

Join the newest Star Wars heroes in this epic activity book, featuring jaw-dropping 3D scenes! Help Ezra and Kanan through mazes, colour in grumpy Chopper, break codes with Zeb and Hera, and create graffiti masterpieces with Sabine. Watch out for the villainous Inquisitor and his Stormtroopers in this Star Wars Rebels adventure. Includes awesome 3D posters and a fold-out full of exclusive character info!
